name: mirrord
description: Install mirrord, a tool that lets you easily mirror traffic from your Kubernetes cluster to your development environment

version.description: Version of mirrord to install. Use 'latest' for the most recent release or specify a version like '3.161.0'

sha256.description: SHA256 checksum for verification. Use 'automatic' to download checksums, 'dev-mode' to skip verification, or provide a specific checksum
